name: @chaminjector/cut-scheme
description: abstract scheme for x-fiber business scheme

scripts.build:packages: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.types.json && cp package.json dist/package.json
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:packages && npm run add:types && npm run add:imports && npm run add:package
scripts.resolve:path: tsc-alias -v --dir dist/_cjs -p tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc-alias -v --dir dist/_types -p tsconfig.types.json
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:dist && npm run resolve:path
